attributes.action: create more parks and playgrounds so kids dont behave anti socially
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i would like the kids of today to have more parks and playgrounds,skate parks, allocated places where they can play and amuse themselves.
i am also proposing park wardens to be in place at these grounds to keep an eye on things, having a direct link to the policeor ambulance service if any problems occur.
kids needs to be kids so they can grow up..........properly.
